offerings.title: Beginner Piano
offerings.description: An introduction to piano basics, proper posture, and note reading.

offerings.title: Intermediate Piano
offerings.description: Build on your skills with scales, chords, and more advanced repertoire.

offerings.title: Advanced Piano Performance
offerings.description: Focus on technique, artistry, and performance preparation.

offerings.title: Beginner Violin
offerings.description: Learn violin basics, bow hold, and first pieces.

offerings.title: Advanced Violin Performance
offerings.description: Polish technique and artistry for concerts or competitions.

offerings.title: Early Childhood Music & Movement
offerings.description: Songs, games, and rhythm activities for young learners.

offerings.title: Family Music Time
offerings.description: Fun and interactive class for families to enjoy music together.

sessions.title: Piano Workshop: Jazz Improvisation
sessions.description: Explore jazz styles and improvisational skills.

sessions.title: Piano Duet Day
sessions.description: Pair up and learn duet repertoire.

sessions.title: String Quartet Coaching
sessions.description: Work with an experienced coach to refine ensemble skills.

sessions.title: Early Childhood Music Camp
sessions.description: A week-long music camp for preschoolers.

sessions.title: Violin Technique Bootcamp
sessions.description: Intense focus on bowing, shifting, and vibrato.

sessions.title: Piano Masterclass with Guest Artist
sessions.description: Receive expert feedback in front of a live audience.

sessions.title: Family Music Jam
sessions.description: Bring instruments and join the fun!
